<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>List custom roles</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/iam/v1/custom_roles"}></MethodEndpoint>



Retrieve all custom roles currently available to the tenant service group identified by the
access token used to authorize this request. 


<div><div><ApiTabs label={undefined} id={undefined}><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

Successful response.

</div><div><MimeTabs className={"openapi-tabs__mime"} schemaType={"response"}><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json"}><SchemaTabs className={"openapi-tabs__schema"}><TabItem label={"Schema"} value={"Schema"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details response"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-response"}><strong>Schema</strong></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"count"} required={true} schemaName={"integer"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"default":1,"description":"Total count of the items","type":"integer"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={true} className={"schemaItem"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"}><summary style={{}}><span className={"openapi-schema__container"}><strong className={"openapi-schema__property"}>items</strong><span className={"openapi-schema__name"}> object[]</span><span className={"openapi-schema__divider"}></span><span className={"openapi-schema__required"}>required</span></span></summary><div style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><li><div style={{"fontSize":"var(--ifm-code-font-size)","opacity":"0.6","marginLeft":"-.5rem","paddingBottom":".5rem"}}>Array [</div></li><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"aggregated_permissions"} required={false} schemaName={"string[]"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"Identifies all permissions available to this TSG. This is a union of the permissions available to the\nTSG, as well as the permissions available to all its child TSGs.\n","type":"array","items":{"type":"string"}}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"description"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"label"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"name"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"The custom role's name. It is used as a path parameter\nfor some custom role APIs.\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={true} className={"schemaItem"}><details style={{}} set.\n","type":"array","items":{"type":"string"}}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"id"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"The ID of a permission set included in this custom role. \n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><li><div \"iam.service_account.create\",\n        \"iam.access_policy.create\"\n      ],\n      \"description\": \"Access to Log Viewer endpoints\",\n      \"id\": \"log_viewer:1234567890\",\n      \"label\": \"Log Viewer\",\n      \"name\": \"log_viewer\",\n      \"permission_sets\": [\n        {\n          \"access_types\": [\n            \"read\"\n          ],\n          \"id\":
